title: Bloomberg Markets: Apple Anniversary Pushes  iPhone Sales
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Apple Anniversary Pushes  iPhone Sales
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Angelo Zino\u0010Analyst\u0010CFRA Research \u0010Discussing Apple forecasting holiday sales that exceeded most analyst estimates, a sign it expects robust demand for the new iPhone X,  John Butler of Bloomberg Intelligence also participates in the conversation. The 10-year anniversary iPhone will help push sales to a record high of $84 billion to $87 billion in the quarter ending in late December, Apple said in a statement.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
